title: Bots Able to build "Removed Items"
body: My brother played a bot game on the TT today and was struggling so I came over to over advice, when I looked at the builds' of the enemy team I saw the opposing Brand bot had a  Blackfire torch! This item was supposedly removed in patch 5.2. Dafaq? BTW my brother's account name is whyznotz if you want to check the match history.

replies.body: I can only assume riot simply removed it from being seen in the shop
Garen Bot builds Atma's Impaler on Twisted Treeline.
items are different on other maps

Blackfire Torch was removed in Patch 5.2, the OP even said that.

Bots have had this issue for quite some time. I think Riot leaves the item coding in-game, and forgets that bots are coded to build the items, so the issue shows up.

inb4 Marksmen update removes items that bots will end up building.
Yes, and it was removed in 5.2 just like he mentioned. Doesn't matter if items are different, the thing was -removed-. lol.
